goal_templates: Did a customer [Customer Name] provide feedback for a Product [Product Name]?
Fetch the feedback text submitted by a customer [Customer Name] for Product [Product Name].
Obtain the purchase and feedback dates for a product bought by a Customer [Customer Name].
List all items bought and reviewed by Customer [Customer Name].
Determine the sentiment (positive/negative/neutral) of the feedback given by a customer for a [Product Name].
